name: CMIOExtensionStream.DiscontinuityFlags
desc: Constants that specify the types of discontinuities that can occur in a media stream.

items.name: static var unknown: CMIOExtensionStream.DiscontinuityFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates a stream discontinuity due to an unknown reason.

items.name: static var time: CMIOExtensionStream.DiscontinuityFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates a time discontinuity in the stream.

items.name: static var sampleDropped: CMIOExtensionStream.DiscontinuityFlags
items.desc: A flag that indicates a discontinuity in the stream due to a dropped frame.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a flag with an integer value.
